column3:
Image-ID if this is an observation of an image
NA if it is a human observation
column4:
Source of the observation:
For plates: plate number (from baseplate upwards) and T=Top, B=bottom; field = field observation; arms unit = flopping about in the bucket when you emptied the arms unit
column7: Please do not use circumflexes, umlauts, or any accent. If copy-pasting, do so "without format".
